SEARCH
Package edu.uiowa.cs.warp

Class InputFileMenu

java.lang.Object
edu.uiowa.cs.warp.InputFileMenu
public class InputFileMenu extends Object
Creates the File menu to interact with Warp input files. This menu provides Open, Create, Save, and SaveAS menu items. There is no Print option, as the file can be printed from the Input File Visualization option of the View menu. This is a view class in a Model-View-Controller software pattern. Thus, methods are provided that can be called by a controller to attach listeners to the menu items. It is intended that the actual editing and display of the file is done by the InputFileEditor, with the controller managing the interactions with the editor, the Warp options, and the Warp system.
Version:
2.0 Fall 2025
Author:
sgoddard

  • Constructor Details

    • InputFileMenu

      public InputFileMenu()
      Constructor to create the menu to interact with Warp input files. Need to call getMenu() to retrieve the menu built and attach it to a a parent menu bar. The name displayed for the menu can be changed by calling menu.setText(), as it is a JMenu.
